revised_title: Understanding the Formation of Ripple-Mark and its Connection to Natural Phenomena
tldr: The authors investigated the formation of ripple-mark in sand and discovered that it is caused by spiral vortices in the water. They found that these vortices start a new furrow and ridge, which leads to the creation of more ripples. The authors also suggested that similar processes might be responsible for the formation of tidal ridges, sand dunes, and cloud patterns in the sky.
